title: may 6: the end of friends
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the finale of the decade long and insanely popular TV sitcom, Friends, which aired today in 2004. She then talks about how one sleepless night lead to one of the most popular guitar riffs of all time! Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
